description: This file defines an immutable Dart class named 'Note' which models a single note with properties like id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt. It includes methods for copying, checking if the note is blank, and generating a preview.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: An immutable class representing a note with string identifier, title, content, and timestamps for creation and last update.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the current note with specified fields replaced.

methods.name: isBlank
methods.description: Returns true if both title and content are empty after trimming.

methods.name: preview
methods.description: Returns a single-line preview of the note's content or title, limited to a specified maximum number of characters.
